meanings.sent1: The tree had folious branches swaying gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: The forest was full of folious trees, creating a beautiful green canopy.
meanings.sent3: The folious plant seemed to be waving hello to passersby.
meanings.sent4: Her folious dress fluttered like a cascade of leaves as she danced.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a vivid landscape with folious trees in every shade of green.

meanings.definition: Covered with or having many leaves.
meanings.sent1: The garden was a folious paradise with plants of all shapes and sizes.
meanings.sent2: The old house had a folious roof that provided shade in the summer.
meanings.sent3: The folious lawn needed to be mowed regularly to keep it tidy.
meanings.sent4: The folious vines climbed the walls, creating a natural tapestry.
meanings.sent5: The folious surroundings made the air feel fresh and clean.

meanings.sent1: The salad was a delicious mix of folious greens and colorful vegetables.
meanings.sent2: The folious wreath on the door welcomed guests with a touch of nature.
meanings.sent3: The folious pattern on the fabric reminded her of a lush forest.
meanings.sent4: The folious design on the wallpaper brought a sense of the outdoors inside.
meanings.sent5: The folious aroma of the herbs filled the kitchen with a fresh scent.
